experience: You and Lauren both know Luke Hohmann, Max Hansen, and 134 others
Dreams do come true!!! Happy Halloween from Infusionsoft!
Infusionsoft launches our new #landingpagebuilder! Drag and drop capability for easy, custom landing pages! Check it out!

We're hiring a Business Partner on our People team to support our sales and marketing leaders.  If you love to help create people processes, move with urgency and flexibility, don't like a "traditional HR" environment, and want to provide strategic guidance to our leadership team, this could be the role for you!

Do you love data, numbers and all things related to the people function of a business? Check out this opportunity to join our people team as an analyst.  You will help us solve big challenges using a data-driven approach!
At Infusionsoft we build a software that solves challenges for small business!

We're hiring a Senior Technical Recruiter that will be responsible for helping us attract the awesome talent that will be building. designing, and managing our product.  Who do you know that wants to help us build great teams that will have an impact on millions of small businesses worldwide!

The Elite Programs at Infusionsoft are for businesses that have hit the million dollar revenue mark and are ready to hire, grow, and develop high-performing teams, in plans for their future growth.  The Elite Programs are a blueprint of how Infusionsoft went from a 3-person start-up to the successful 550+ employee company  we are today.  I manage the Elite programs assisting our customers with setting their vision and reinforcing their purpose in a way that translates to results, performance, and growth of their business.  These programs help you transition from an entrepreneur to a CEO.  Click the link below if you are interested in learning more! https://eliteforum.infusionsoft.com/

*Built and designed website using GoDaddy and WordPress *Create content and manage partnerships of a lifestyle blog *Utilize various different forms of social channels including: Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, and LinkedIn *Track and analyze ROI and outcomes from social/blog posts utilizing Google Analytics, Prime, Planoly, and hashtag trending
Talent Acquisition Team Lead | Hiring Partner

We love small businesses! At Infusionsoft, our purpose is to help small businesses succeed. As a talent acquisition team, we are focused on building teams and attracting talent that share the same passion of changing the world for small business.  As the Team Lead for the Talent Acquisition Team responsibilities include:  *Manage Talent Planning and Headcount Process for Infusionsoft  *Provide Strategic Insight and management on Talent Acquisition Projects  *Enable scalable people processes for Infusionsoft's growth plan  *Assist in developing and implementing talent branding strategies for Infusionsoft's employment branding presence As a Hiring Partner responsibilities include:  *Recruitment for various different corporate positions including sales, marketing, finance, legal, accounting, people and customer success.  *Developing and implementing process improvements for hiring *Leading Hiring Manager Education   *Fostering our talent brand as an employer of choice  *Creating and innovating on positive candidate experiences

My overall responsibility at Govig and Associates is sourcing and recruiting top talent for a variety of roles within the greater Phoenix area. Positions include administrative roles through executive level, including very specialized searches outside of the Phoenix market. Works to fully understand each of the companies that we partner with in order to provide unparalleled recruiting service and ensure a good long-term fit for both the company and candidate. Provides recruitment support from the initial conversation to offer stage and onboarding to ensure a smooth transition for each candidate that I work with. Creates strong relationships within the Phoenix market to keep up-to-date with market information and trends.Additionally serves as a member of Govig Tax, the division of Govig & Associates that concentrates on Staff through Executive Search in the International, Federal (Tax Compliance, Planning, Provisions, Research, Tax Financial Reporting, FAS109/ASC740, FIN48, Tax Controversy), State and Local and Partnerships arenas.

Organized formal recruitment for sororities at University of Arizona using database compilation software to construct matrixes of events Participated in the recruitment process of University students to join Greek life, including many large-scale presentations and orientations for new membersAttended AFLV, a leadership conference that involved expertise in recruiting
